description: Lists your resource data sync configurations. Includes information about the last time a sync attempted to start, the last sync status, and the last time a sync successfully completed. The number of sync configurations might be too large to return using a single call to ListResourceDataSync. You can limit the number of sync configurations returned by using the MaxResults parameter. To determine whether there are more sync configurations to list, check the value of NextToken in the output. If there are more sync configurations to list, you can request them by specifying the NextToken returned in the call to the parameter of a subsequent call.

nested_items.name: ResourceDataSyncItems
nested_items.description: A list of your current resource data sync configurations and their statuses.

nested_items.name: SyncName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource data sync.

nested_items.name: SyncType
nested_items.description: The type of resource data sync. If SyncType is SyncToDestination, then the resource data sync synchronizes data to an S3 bucket. If the SyncType is SyncFromSource then the resource data sync synchronizes data from Organizations or from multiple Amazon Web Services Regions.

nested_items.name: SyncSource
nested_items.description: Information about the source where the data was synchronized.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The type of data source for the resource data sync. SourceType is either AwsOrganizations (if an organization is present in Organizations) or singleAccountMultiRegions.

nested_items.name: AwsOrganizationsSource
nested_items.description: The field name in SyncSource for the ResourceDataSyncAwsOrganizationsSource type.

nested_items.name: OrganizationSourceType
nested_items.description: If an Amazon Web Services organization is present, this is either OrganizationalUnits or EntireOrganization. For OrganizationalUnits, the data is aggregated from a set of organization units. For EntireOrganization, the data is aggregated from the entire Amazon Web Services organization.

nested_items.name: OrganizationalUnits
nested_items.description: The Organizations organization units included in the sync.

nested_items.name: OrganizationalUnitId
nested_items.description: The Organizations unit ID data source for the sync.

nested_items.name: SourceRegions
nested_items.description: The SyncSource Amazon Web Services Regions included in the resource data sync.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: IncludeFutureRegions
nested_items.description: Whether to automatically synchronize and aggregate data from new Amazon Web Services Regions when those Regions come online.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The data type name for including resource data sync state. There are four sync states:

nested_items.name: EnableAllOpsDataSources
nested_items.description: When you create a resource data sync, if you choose one of the Organizations options, then Systems Manager automatically enables all OpsData sources in the selected Amazon Web Services Regions for all Amazon Web Services accounts in your organization (or in the selected organization units). For more information, see Setting up Systems Manager Explorer to display data from multiple accounts and Regions in the Amazon Web Services Systems Manager User Guide.

nested_items.name: S3Destination
nested_items.description: Configuration information for the target S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket where the aggregated data is stored.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: An Amazon S3 prefix for the bucket.

nested_items.name: SyncFormat
nested_items.description: A supported sync format. The following format is currently supported: JsonSerDe.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region with the S3 bucket targeted by the resource data sync.

nested_items.name: AWSKMSKeyARN
nested_items.description: The ARN of an encryption key for a destination in Amazon S3. Must belong to the same Region as the destination S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: DestinationDataSharing
nested_items.description: Enables destination data sharing. By default, this field is null.

nested_items.name: DestinationDataSharingType
nested_items.description: The sharing data type. Only Organization is supported.

nested_items.name: LastSyncTime
nested_items.description: The last time the configuration attempted to sync (UTC).

nested_items.name: LastSuccessfulSyncTime
nested_items.description: The last time the sync operations returned a status of SUCCESSFUL (UTC).

nested_items.name: SyncLastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource data sync was changed.

nested_items.name: LastStatus
nested_items.description: The status reported by the last sync.

nested_items.name: SyncCreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the configuration was created (UTC).

nested_items.name: LastSyncStatusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message details reported by the last sync.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. Use this token to get the next set of results.
